post.description: Register a new Customer with the provided details.
Register a new Vendor with the provided details.
Send a password reset code to the user's email if the email is found in the system.
Reset the user's password using the provided email, OTP, and new password.
Send an OTP to the user's email for verification purposes.
Verify the OTP sent to the user's email.
Authenticate a user and return the user details and access token.

get.summary: Login or Register with Google OAuth
get.description: Initiates the OAuth flow by redirecting the user to Google's OAuth consent screen.

302.description: Redirects the user to the Google OAuth consent screen.

Location.description: The URL to which the user is redirected for Google authentication.

get.description: Handles the callback from Google after user authentication and registration. Returns user data and access token.

200.description: Successful response containing user information and access token.

id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

profile_image.description: The URL path to the user's profile image.

role.description: The role of the user, e.g., 'customer'.

status.description: The status of the user, e.g., 'active'.

token.description: The access token for the authenticated user.

500.description: Error response if there is an issue with the Google OAuth process or database operations.

post.description: Revoke all existing tokens for the authenticated user and generate a new personal access token.
Log out the authenticated user by revoking the access token.

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information.

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information.

email: The email has already been taken.

put.description: Update the authenticated vendor's profile information.

email: The email has already been taken.

post.description: Change the password of the authenticated user.

400.description: Invalid input or current password is incorrect
